name: Labyrinth: A Queen's Devotion
description: In the 16th Century Malaya, Che Siti Wan Kembang is on her way to war but is stopped by a sudden earthquake caused by her adopted daughter, Puteri Saadong, who was born with mystical powers that she has yet to control. Che Siti now needs to save her daughter from her nightmare by escaping the maze that she was trapped in.
